thread.title: Pistons rout Hawks 115-87 in preseason finale

title: Pistons rout Hawks 115-87 in preseason finale
text: Close Image 1 of 4 Atlanta Hawks' Dennis Schroder drives to the basket against Detroit Pistons’ Jodie Meeks (20) during the first half of a preseason NBA basketball game Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Auburn Hills, Mich. Atlanta Hawks' Dennis Schroder drives to the basket against Detroit Pistons’ Jodie Meeks (20) during the first half of a preseason NBA basketball game Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Auburn Hills, Mich. Photo: Duane Burleson, AP Image 2 of 4 Atlanta Hawks' Mike Muscala (31) tries to beat Detroit Pistons’ Marcus Morris (13) to a rebound during the first half of a preseason NBA basketball game Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Auburn Hills, Mich. Atlanta Hawks' Mike Muscala (31) tries to beat Detroit Pistons’ Marcus Morris (13) to a rebound during the first half of a preseason NBA basketball game Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Auburn Hills, Mich. Photo: Duane Burleson, AP Image 3 of 4 Atlanta Hawks' Shelvin Mack (8) goes to the basket against Detroit Pistons’ Aron Baynes (12) during the first half of a preseason NBA basketball game Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Auburn Hills, Mich. Atlanta Hawks' Shelvin Mack (8) goes to the basket against Detroit Pistons’ Aron Baynes (12) during the first half of a preseason NBA basketball game Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Auburn Hills, Mich. Photo: Duane Burleson, AP Image 4 of 4 Atlanta Hawks' Mike Muscala (31) defends the basket against a shot by Detroit Pistons’ Stanley Johnson (3) during the first half of a preseason NBA basketball game Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Auburn Hills, Mich. Atlanta Hawks' Mike Muscala (31) defends the basket against a shot by Detroit Pistons’ Stanley Johnson (3) during the first half of a preseason NBA basketball game Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in Auburn Hills, ... more Pistons rout Hawks 115-87 in preseason finale 1 / 4 Back to Gallery AUBURN HILLS, Mich. (AP) — Stanley Johnson scored 20 points and Marcus Morris added 17 points and 10 rebounds as the Detroit Pistons routed the Atlanta Hawks 115-87 on Friday night in the teams' preseason finale. Hawks: Reserve Mike Scott had 20 points in 29 minutes. . Walter Tavares had 12 rebounds, playing much of the game against Andre Drummond , but only made 1 of 6 shots. Pistons: Reserve Jodie Meeks had 17 points. . Drummond had 13 points and 8 rebounds while only playing 18 minutes. Nice debut: After missing the first seven preseason games with a concussion, Steve Blake made his first appearance in a Pistons uniform. He finished with 12 assists in 24 minutes. Limited Rosters: With the teams playing each other in the regular-season opener on Tuesday, both coaches held back significant portions of their rosters. Kentavious Caldwell-Pope, Reggie Jackson and Ersan Ilyasova all sat out for Detroit, while Atlanta left Al Horford , Kyle Korver , Paul Millsap , Thabo Sefolosha and Tiago Splitter at home. Southeast Texas sports news
